#BlackMagicCraft #Episode167 #BASICS

If you've been struggling to decide what bits of terrain you should build first, this video should help. Theres are the 5 (actually 6) bits of terrain I think you should get into your collection first, and what I order I think you should do them in.

*REFRENCED VIDEOS*


HOW TO USE TERRAIN
https://youtu.be/PcFU8zmV6A8

BASIC TILES
https://youtu.be/kxzUm3rFzBs

HOW TO CUT PERFECT SQUARES
https://youtu.be/q4PM8TdZcA8

FROSTGRAVE TILES (PART 1)
https://youtu.be/Vj71vkI25HQ

MODULAR RUINED WALLS
https://youtu.be/nNyTPC4QMm8

PILLARS
https://youtu.be/a2UXNbw6Ynw

GOTHIC ARCHES
https://youtu.be/k-qLlFNQWRs

STEEL "BOSS" DOOR
https://youtu.be/g1PA9_cFMZw

DUNGEON STACKERS
https://youtu.be/0xNWUwZRIb8

EASY PINE TREES
https://youtu.be/os71nNG9CNY

X-MAS VILLAGE PINE TREE CONVERSION
(Trees) https://youtu.be/ZlAnpJomWCk
(Bases) https://youtu.be/xaDLkRQOhyM

title: Just starting? Terrain you should build FIRST.
